Name: True Desire
Ingredients: 30 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: The Polish Bacardí Legacy 2013 winning cocktail , created by Rafal Nawrot at Sky Bar in Qubus Hotel-Prestige, Katowice, Poland. (Rafal's original recipe called for 10ml De Kuyper Orange Bitter (no longer made) rather than orange curacao.)
Nutrition: One serving of True Desire contains 175 calories
